content:
Aarhus University is hiring Assistant and Associate Professors. Apart from our usual strengths, the department is looking to expand in quantum computation; see https://quantum.au.dk/
https://cs.au.dk/about-us/vacancies/job/aarhus-university-is-hiring-assistant-and-associate-professors-to-contribute-to-the-future-of-the-department-of-computer-science-2
